title: Accelerating AI Development with DataStax HCD
description:
Did you know that you can easily build Apache Cassandra® based Generative AI applications on DataStax’s Hyper-Converged Database (HCD)? Join Aaron Ploetz for a live session to walk you through the beginning of your journey with HCD, work in a little of the new DataAPI, and finish with a Generative AI application that uses Langflow with HCD.

Takeaways:

Learn more about DataStax HCD and the self-service aspects.
Skip Cassandra data modeling with the DataAPI.
Seamlessly HCD as a data source for Langflow
Deploy a Langflow application on top of HCD.

Additional Resources:
- DataStax Developer Hub: https://dtsx.io/devhub
- DataStax Blog: https://dtsx.io/howto
- Try Langflow: https://dtsx.io/trylangflow
- Try Astra DB: https://dtsx.io/40kQpI6
____________________

Stay in touch:
- Join our Discord Community: https://discord.gg/datastax
- Follow us on X: https://x.com/DataStaxDevs
